Pacifist.description: A pacifist role. They gain a bonus `-50% Wealth Power` perk.

Tennis.description: A professional tennis player both playing nationals and teaching other players.

Unifier.description: Unifiers help unite everyone. They gain a bonus `+0.75 Unity` for each work.

Banker.description: They gain a bonus `+100 Credits` (scales with inflation) for each work.

Police.description: A policeman, catching thiefs. They have increased chances of robbers failing (`+3 Rob Defense Levels`).

Robber.description: A thief. They have increased chances of successful robs (`+2 Rob Attack Levels`).

Student.description: A student. Gain access to the `questions` command.

Terrorist.description: [Limited Time] Terrorist role! Gain `+85 Rob Attack Levels` but `-3 Rob Defense Levels`! No way your failing robs anymore!
